name: Breakfast Ham Cups
ingredients: 1 package sliced ham (not shredded), about 10 slices
instructions: Grease muffin cups and heat oven to 350 degrees. Gently line each cup with one slice of ham. In microwaveable bowl place onion, bell pepper and butter; microwave until cooked, 1-2 minutes. Meanwhile, beat together eggs, milk, salt and pepper. Set asice. Evenly divide onions and bell pepper between muffin cups, then add cheese. Pour milk mixture on top (about 1/2 egg per cup) and sprinkle with green onions. Bake 20-25 minutes and serve.
